price: څوک چې وغواړي د خپلې لورینې (رحمت) لپاره یې ځانګړی (غوره) کوي، او الله د ستر فضل خاوند دی.
arabic: يَخۡتَصُّ بِرَحۡمَتِهِۦ مَن يَشَآءُۗ وَٱللَّهُ ذُو ٱلۡفَضۡلِ ٱلۡعَظِيمِ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: yakhtaṣṣu biraḥmatihi man yashāu wal-lahu dhū al-faḍli al-ʿaẓīmi
